short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to wallhaven.cc thumbnails to set the wallpaper with the wallheaven app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enhances your browsing experience on wallhaven.cc by allowing you to quickly set any wallpaper as your desktop background with just one click. By adding a convenient button to each wallpaper thumbnail, it connects with the 'wallheaven' daemon installed on your system to instantly apply the selected wallpaper. No need to download or manually configure the backgroundâ€”just browse, click, and enjoy a fresh look for your desktop.
